list.name: Changes
list.comment: Fixed a bug which was causing a missing turn after a user was trying to override a mark on the board. This fix is in the new class called Move.

task.summary:
A first attempt to build the game.
Created Ticktacktoe main class, Player class to create players, GameInitializer class to initialize the game (create a board, set players etc.) WinnerChecker is the first mechanism for checking if there is a winner already. The Gameplay class will be guiding players through the game.

Gameplay improvement
Added a possibility for playerTwo to make his move. Added a console message with a name of the winner. Added an increment for player score after win. Added a loop for max. rounds = 5 -> (5x2 players) Added an if statement that prints message on the console "no winner" if there won't be any winner after 5 turns. Added a protection in Board.java which prevents a user for overriding a sign that already has been set (you cannot override your/your opponent's move). Added a Tester.java class in the new package "tests" but it has to be written. Added a temporary package "ttt" for the main classes.
The return of the method has been set to boolean (it needs a further analysis and maybe a rollback)
Fixed a bug which was causing a missing turn after a user was trying to override a mark on the board. This fix is in the new class called Move.

Added a loop for max. rounds = 5 -> (5x2 players) Added an if statement that prints message on the console "no winner" if there won't be any winner after 5 turns. Added a Tester.java class in the new package "tests" but it has to be written. Added a temporary package "ttt" for the main classes.

The return of the method has been set to boolean (it needs a further analysis and maybe a rollback)
Fixed a bug which was causing a missing turn after a user was trying to override a mark on the board. This fix is in the new class called Move.
